rooms.name: Main Entrance Hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall aligned with Vastu principles. A welcoming open space.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open living area with Mediterranean design elements and a view of the pool.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Formal dining space adjacent to the living room, enhanced by natural light from north-facing windows.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern Mediterranean kitchen with ample storage and functional layout.

rooms.name: Mediterranean Style Living Room Extension
rooms.description: An extended open space for relaxation, incorporating local elements.

rooms.name: Guest Bathrooms
rooms.description: Dual guest bathrooms designed with modern fixtures and sufficient lighting.

openings.features: Large, inviting entryway that adheres to Vastu principles.

openings.description: Strategically placed windows to maximize natural light and ventilation while respecting local climate norms.

special_features.name: Swimming Pool
special_features.description: A centrally located, rectangular swimming pool with Mediterranean landscaping around it.

special_features.name: Home Theater
special_features.description: A dedicated home theater area with soundproofing and ambient lighting for a cinematic experience.
